description:
ZUGFeRD is an initiative from German government to foster electronic invoices. It is based on using PDF/A-3 to store invoices along with embedded xml descriptor for easy processing.
This library allows to create these xml descriptors in an easy way.

Find more about the library here:
http://www.s2-industries.com/wordpress/2013/11/creating-zugferd-descriptors-with-c

Development of the library is supported by:
CKSolution, cksolution.de
releaseNotes:
1.18.0:
fixed charge indicator issue for allowance charges

1.17.0:
critical fix for loading ZUGFeRD files!

1.16.0:
quick bug fix for additional references

1.15.0:
additional references on tradelineitem level

1.14.0:
bufix in SpecifiedSupplyChainTradeAgreement.

1.13.0:
bugfix for more compliance by KVS-CBL:
https://github.com/stephanstapel/ZUGFeRD-csharp/pull/7

1.12.0:
IssueDateTime of referenced documents is optional now

1.11.0:

Reading tradeallowancecharge on trade item level

1.10.0:
large update towards full support of ZUGFeRD 1.0

[older releases omitted]
title: ZUGFeRD electronic invoice creator
